entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
